name: Throne of Bone
description:
Aid your minions with spells as they autobattle to conquer dozens of encounters.


Draft your team from a pool of over 50 minions and explore their strengths and synergies.


Scheme, forge, and explore the mysteries of your ancestral keep.


Restore your castle and reclaim the Throne of Bone.



Keep up with our development and give feedback on Discord!

Features

- 50+ Unique minions with undying dedication
- 30+ Necromantic spells to sway combat in your favor
- 20+ Relics to empower you as your reclaim your kingdom
- Numerous Castle Activities to add variety to your runs!
